findings.rationale: Limiting liability to the total license fees paid may not cover significant damages, exposing the parties to financial risks.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party's liability is limited to the total license fees paid in the preceding calendar year.

findings.rationale: The ability to terminate for convenience may lead to sudden loss of services or support without significant notice.
findings.evidence_quote: Either party may terminate for convenience with 30 days written notice.

findings.rationale: Capping indemnification at $750,000 may not cover all potential liabilities arising from breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: each party indemnifies the other for claims arising from its own breach, capped at $750,000 per claim.

findings.rationale: Confidentiality obligations lasting only 3 years may be insufficient for certain sensitive information.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidentiality obligations continue for 3 years after termination of this Agreement.
